test.name: Verificar se o usuario consegue responder a uma postagem

kw.name: Dado que eu acesse o site do twitter
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Quando o usuario tentar entrar com as credenciais corretas
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: E clicar no botão de nova postagem
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.msg: ${MENSAGEM-POST} = Teste de nova postagem. Data e hora:18/03/2024, 11:37:40
kw.arg: Teste de nova postagem. Data e hora:${DATA-HORA}
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.msg: ${ULTIMA-POSTAGEM} = //*[text()="Teste de nova postagem. Data e hora:18/03/2024, 11:37:40"]
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Teste de nova postagem. Data e hora:18/03/2024, 11:37:40' into text field '//*[@data-testid="tweetTextarea_0"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E clicar no botao de postar
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E vai até o seu perfil
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('Teste de resposta',) to page.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então deverá aparecer uma notificação confirmando a postagem
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//*[text()="Your post was sent."]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
